html:
— Recommendations are independently chosen by Reviewed's editors. Purchases you make through our links may earn us a commission.

KitchenAid is known for quality products that range from large appliances to its iconic stand mixers that are featured in so many kitchens. Maybe you used one at a friend or family member's home during Thanksgiving and are looking to get your own. Or maybe you've waited all year for prices to drop before splurging. Either way, Cyber Monday is the perfect time to score a deal on any KitchenAid product you've been eyeing. 

Tackle your holiday shopping with deals and expert advice delivered straight to your phone. Sign up for text message alerts from the deal-hunting team at Reviewed.

Thanks to Cyber Monday discounts, you can save up to $80 on one of the brand's 5-quart tilt-head mixers. You can also get a smaller 3.5- or 4.5-quart mixer for $50 off if you prefer a smaller size. There are also big savings on KitchenAid food processors and choppers, which are discounted as much as $50. 

► Cyber Monday 2021:  Scammers are sending fake 'store' surveys and impersonating Amazon. Here's what to watch out for.

► Cyber Monday 2021:  200+ Amazon Cyber Monday deals we're live tracking: AirPods, Oculus, Roombas and more

We've tried and tested many KitchenAid products at Reviewed. The stand mixers are a classic, and we're particularly fond of the Artisan Series 5-Quart Stand Mixer. It's easy to use and its size allows it to tackle recipes for as many as 72 cookies or four loaves of bread. We think it's the creme de la creme of stand mixers. 

The best KitchenAid mixer Cyber Monday deals 

  • KitchenAid Classic 4.5-Quart Stand Mixer at Best Buy for $249.99 (Save $50)
  • KitchenAid Deluxe 4.5-Quart Tilt-Head Mixer from KitchenAid for $299.99 (Save $80)
  • KitchenAid Artisan Mini Plus 3.5-Quart Tilt-Head Stand Mixer from KitchenAid starting at $279.99 (Save $70)
  • KitchenAid Artisan Series 5-Quart Tilt-Head Mixer at Williams Sonoma for $349.95 (Save $80)
  • KitchenAid Pro 600 6-Quart Stand Mixer at Williams Sonoma for $429.95 (Save $100) 

The best KitchenAid mixer accessory Cyber Monday deals 

  • KitchenAid Flex Edge Beater Attachment for 5-Quart Stand Mixer at Bed Bath and Beyond for $24.99 (Save $10)
  • KitchenAid Citrus Juicer Attachment at Target for $29.40 (Save $5.59)
  • KitchenAid Fresh Prep Slicer/Shredder Attachment at Kohl's for $39.99 (Save $20)
  • KitchenAid Spiralizer Attachment 1-inch at Amazon for $69 (Save $60.99)
  • KitchenAid Metal Food Grinder Attachment at KitchenAid for $69.99 (Save $30) 
  • KitchenAid Pasta Press Attachment for Stand Mixers at Bed Bath and Beyond for $139.99 (Save $60) 
  • KitchenAid Food Processor with Commercial Style Dicing Kit from HSN for $169.99 (Save $30) 

Other KitchenAid Cyber Monday deals 

  • KitchenAid 7-Piece Prep and Mixing Bowl Set from QVC for $24.80 (Save $8.20)
  • KitchenAid 5-Speed Ultra Power Hand Mixer from KitchenAid for $39.99 (Save $15) 
  • KitchenAid 3.5-cup Chopper from Amazon for $39.99 (Save $15) 
  • KitchenAid Cordless 7-Speed Hand Mixer from KitchenAid for $69.99 (Save $30)
  • KitchenAid 13-cup Food Processor at Bed Bath and Beyond for $149.99 (Save $50) 

There's more where this deal came from. Sign up for Reviewed's Perks and Rec newsletter and we'll keep 'em coming every Sunday through Friday.

The product experts at Reviewed have all your shopping needs covered. Follow Reviewed on Facebook , Twitter , Instagram , TikTok or Flipboard for the latest deals, product reviews and more.

Prices were accurate at the time this article was published but may change over time.
